definitions: in a way that has meaning

examples.text: the parts, however entertaining individually, must cohere meaningfully

definitions: in a serious, important, or worthwhile manner

examples.text: even isolated communities can contribute meaningfully to national development
the right to participate meaningfully in the decisions that affect one's life

shortDefinitions: in serious, important, or worthwhile manner

definitions: in a way that communicates something without directly expressing it

examples.text: when he reports to work, his supervisor stares meaningfully at the clock

shortDefinitions: in way that communicates something without directly expressing it
